panels.description: How long the peer is in this HA state
panels.title: HA State Time

panels.description:
Ideally this should be lower than the number of CPU cores available.

[ âš ï¸ Grafana does not support variables in threshold mappings, so these panels will not dynamically change colour when load exceeds the available cores ]
panels.title: System Load [ Available cores = $available_cores ]

panels.description: The time peer last transitioned to Established state
panels.title: BGP Peer Flaps

panels.description: Number of users connected to Global Protect
panels.title: VPN Users

panels.description: These stats come from the "top" command output and does not include dataplane CPUs
panels.title: CPU Usage

panels.description: Total throughput of all the logical interfaces
panels.title: Total Throughput

targets.query: SELECT last("speed") AS "speed", last("state") AS "state" FROM "palo_alto_interface_info" WHERE ("hostname"::tag =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "interface"::tag =~ /^$interfaces$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "interface"::tag, "hostname"::tag

options.content:
Not all of these are graphed, but should be available in the measurement.

This output is from ``show counter global filter category flow`` command 
| name | severity | category | aspect | description |
|------|----------|----------|--------|-------------|
| flow_rcv_err | drop | flow | parse | Packets dropped: flow stage receive error |
| flow_rcv_dot1q_tag_err | drop | flow | parse | Packets dropped: 802.1q tag not configured |
| flow_no_interface | drop | flow | parse | Packets dropped: invalid interface |
| flow_policy_auth | info | flow | session | Session setup: authentication match |
| flow_policy_auth_err | info | flow | session | Session setup: no authentication match |
| flow_policy_nofwd | drop | flow | session | Session setup: no destination zone from forwarding |
| flow_policy_no_zone_i | drop | flow | session | Session setup: no incoming zone |
| flow_policy_deny | drop | flow | session | Session setup: denied by policy |
| flow_policy_nat_land | drop | flow | session | Session setup: source NAT IP allocation result in LAND attack |
| flow_tcp_non_syn | info | flow | session | Non-SYN TCP packets without session match |
| flow_tcp_non_syn_drop | drop | flow | session | Packets dropped: non-SYN TCP without session match |
| flow_fwd_l2_flood | info | flow | forward | Destination MAC not found on vlan. Proceed with flooding |
| flow_fwd_l2_same_interface | drop | flow | forward | Packets dropped: destination MAC on same interface |
| flow_fwd_l2_no_interface | drop | flow | forward | Packets dropped: empty VLAN without any interface |
| flow_fwd_l3_bcast_drop | drop | flow | forward | Packets dropped: unhandled IP broadcast |
| flow_fwd_l3_mcast_drop | drop | flow | forward | Packets dropped: no route for IP multicast |
| flow_fwd_l3_ttl_zero | drop | flow | forward | Packets dropped: IP TTL reaches zero |
| flow_fwd_l3_noroute | drop | flow | forward | Packets dropped: no route |
| flow_fwd_l3_noarp | drop | flow | forward | Packets dropped: no ARP |
| flow_fwd_zonechange | drop | flow | forward | Packets dropped: forwarded to different zone |
| flow_fwd_notopology | drop | flow | forward | Packets dropped: no forwarding configured on interface |
| flow_fwd_mtu_exceeded | info | flow | forward | Packets lengths exceeded MTU |
| flow_fwd_ip_df_drop | drop | flow | forward | Packets dropped: exceeded MTU but DF bit present |
| flow_fwd_drop_noxmit | info | flow | forward | Packet dropped at forwarding: noxmit |
| flow_fwd_drop_invstate | drop | flow | forward | Packet dropped at forwarding: invalid session state |
| flow_sctp_rcv | info | flow | session | SCTP packets received |
| flow_parse_ip_cksm | drop | flow | parse | Packets dropped: IP checksum failure |
| flow_parse_ip_hdr | drop | flow | parse | Packets dropped: Packet too short to cover IP header |
| flow_parse_ip6_truncated | drop | flow | parse | Packets dropped: IPv6 packet truncated |
| flow_ip6_mcast_off | info | flow | pktproc | Packets received: IPv6 multicast pkts with flow off |
| flow_parse_icmp6_inv_pkt | drop | flow | parse | Packets dropped: error parsing embedded IPv6 embedded packet |
| flow_parse_l4_hdr | drop | flow | parse | Packets dropped: TCP (UDP/ICMP/SCTP) packet too short |
| flow_parse_l4_cksm | drop | flow | parse | Packets dropped: TCP/UDP checksum failure |
| flow_parse_land | drop | flow | parse | Packets dropped: land attack |
| flow_parse_teardrop | drop | flow | parse | Packets dropped: teardrop attack |
| flow_parse_ipfrag_df_on | info | flow | parse | IP fragments with DF/Reserve bit on |
| flow_parse_unmatched_icmperr | info | flow | parse | Packets dropped: Unmatched ICMP error message |
| flow_sys_clk_backward | warn | flow | pktproc | Number of system clock goes backward |
| flow_bcast_pkt_rcv | info | flow | parse | IP broadcast pkt received |
| flow_dhcp_bcast_pkt_rcv | info | flow | parse | DHCP broadcast pkt received |
| flow_dhcp_ucast_fwd_noarp | info | flow | pktproc | DHCP unicast forward without ARP |
| flow_dos_icmp_replyneedfrag | warn | flow | dos | Packets dropped: Unsuprressed ICMP Need Fragmentation |
| flow_xmt_platform_encap_err | drop | flow | offload | Packets dropped: Platform encapsulation error |
| flow_ipfrag_recv | info | flow | ipfrag | IP fragments received |
| flow_ipfrag_free | info | flow | ipfrag | IP fragments freed after defragmentation |
| flow_ipfrag_merge | info | flow | ipfrag | IP defragmentation completed |
| flow_ipfrag_swbuf | info | flow | ipfrag | Software buffers allocated for reassembled IP packet |
| flow_ipfrag_refrag_mtu | info | flow | ipfrag | IP fragment exceeds MTU |
| flow_ipfrag_frag | info | flow | ipfrag | IP fragments transmitted |
| flow_ipfrag_tcp | warn | flow | ipfrag | TCP packets processed by IP fragmentation |
| flow_ipfrag_restore | info | flow | ipfrag | IP fragment restore packet |
| flow_ipfrag_del | info | flow | ipfrag | IP fragment delete entry |
| flow_ipfrag_free_fraglist | info | flow | ipfrag | IP fragment free fraglist |
| flow_ipfrag_list_alloc | info | flow | ipfrag | IP fragment fraglist allocated |
| flow_ipfrag_list_free | info | flow | ipfrag | IP fragment fraglist freed |
| flow_ipfrag_result_alloc | info | flow | ipfrag | IP fragment result allocated |
| flow_ipfrag_result_free | info | flow | ipfrag | IP fragment result freed |
| flow_ipfrag_entry_alloc | info | flow | ipfrag | IP fragment entry allocated |
| flow_ipfrag_entry_free | info | flow | ipfrag | IP fragment entry freed |
| flow_predict_installed | info | flow | pktproc | Predict sessions installed |
| flow_predict_match | info | flow | pktproc | Packets matched predict session |
| flow_predict_install_delete | info | flow | pktproc | Predict session deleted at predict install |
| flow_predict_session | info | flow | session | Sessions created via predict |
| flow_predict_session_dup | info | flow | session | Duplicate Predict Session installation attempts |
| flow_release_nat_sess_snat | info | flow | pktproc | nat release sess src-nat |
| flow_action_close | drop | flow | pktproc | TCP sessions closed via injecting RST |
| flow_action_reset | drop | flow | pktproc | TCP clients reset via responding RST |
| flow_ager_delayed_delete | info | flow | pktproc | Delayed session aging for packets being processed |
| flow_ager_delay_discard | info | flow | pktproc | session ager to discard session due to rematch |
| flow_rematch_session_deny | warn | flow | pktproc | number of rematch deny for parent sessions |
| flow_rematch_session_success | info | flow | pktproc | number of rematch success for parent sessions |
| flow_rematch_child_success | info | flow | pktproc | number of rematch success for child sessions |
| flow_arp_pkt_rcv | info | flow | arp | ARP packets received |
| flow_arp_pkt_xmt | info | flow | arp | ARP packets transmitted |
| flow_arp_pkt_replied | info | flow | arp | ARP requests replied |
| flow_arp_pkt_learned | info | flow | arp | ARP entry learned |
| flow_arp_rcv_gratuitous | info | flow | arp | Gratuitous ARP packets received |
| flow_arp_rcv_err | drop | flow | arp | ARP receive error |
| flow_arp_resolve_xmt | info | flow | arp | ARP resolution packets transmitted |
| flow_nd_pkt_submit | info | flow | nd | ND packets submited to process |
| flow_nd_pkt_rcv | info | flow | nd | ND packets received |
| flow_nd_pkt_xmt | info | flow | nd | ND packets transmitted |
| flow_nd_neigh_gc | info | flow | nd | ND entry GC |
| flow_nd_entry_not_found | error | flow | nd | ND entry not found for na |
| flow_mld_pkt_rcv | info | flow | mld | MLD packets received |
| flow_mld_rcv_err | drop | flow | mld | MLD receive error |
| flow_host_pkt_rcv | info | flow | mgmt | Packets received from control plane |
| flow_host_pkt_xmt | info | flow | mgmt | Packets transmitted to control plane |
| flow_host_rcv_err | drop | flow | mgmt | Packets dropped: receive error from control plane |
| flow_host_decap_err | drop | flow | mgmt | Packets dropped: decapsulation error from control plane |
| flow_host_service_allow | info | flow | mgmt | Device management session allowed |
| flow_host_service_deny | drop | flow | mgmt | Device management session denied |
| flow_host_service_unknown | drop | flow | mgmt | Session discarded: unknown application to control plane |
| flow_host_rcv_zonechange | info | flow | mgmt | Host session: packet received from different zone |
| flow_host_vardata_rate_limit_ok | info | flow | mgmt | Host vardata not sent: rate limit ok |
| flow_host_fwd_zonechange | info | flow | mgmt | Host session: packet forwarded to different zone |
| flow_tunnel_encap_err | drop | flow | tunnel | Packet dropped: tunnel encapsulation error |
| flow_tunnel_decap_err | drop | flow | tunnel | Packet dropped: tunnel decapsulation error |
| flow_tunnel_encap_mtu_err | drop | flow | tunnel | Packet encapped: MTU handling error |
| flow_tunnel_decap_natt_tp_0_err | drop | flow | tunnel | Packet decapped: tunnel entry not found for nat-t decap, drop packet |
| flow_tunnel_ipsec_esp_encap | info | flow | tunnel | Packet encapped: IPSec ESP |
| flow_tunnel_ipsec_esp_encap_swbuf | info | flow | tunnel | Packet encapped: IPSec ESP encrypt clear text pkts with cloned swbuf |
| flow_tunnel_ipsec_esp_decap | info | flow | tunnel | Packet decapped: IPSec ESP |
| flow_tunnel_ipsec_replay_err | drop | flow | tunnel | Packet dropped: header sequence number is a replay |
| flow_tunnel_ipsec_wrong_spi | drop | flow | tunnel | Packet dropped: IPsec SA for spi in packet not found |
| flow_tunnel_ipsec_auth_failed | drop | flow | tunnel | Packet dropped: Authentication failed |
| flow_tunnel_natt_nomatch | drop | flow | tunnel | Packet dropped: IPSec NATT packet without SPI match |
| flow_tunnel_ipsec_ip_check | warn | flow | tunnel | Decrypted tunnel inner packet has tunnel end-point IP address |
| flow_gps2s_incorrect_zone | warn | flow | tunnel | GPS2S: incorrect zone in sslvpn retrofit, lookup to fpp will fail |
| flow_tunnel_slowpath_race | info | flow | tunnel | ESP/AH packet comes before tunnel finishes installation |
| flow_tunnel_encap_resolve | info | flow | tunnel | tunnel structure lookup resolve |
| flow_tunnel_encap_resolve_mt | info | flow | tunnel | Multi-tunnel structure lookup resolve |
| flow_sdwan_internal_ager | info | flow | sdwan | SDWAN FEC/PD ager count |
| flow_tunnel_ka_req_rx | info | flow | tunnel | Tunnel keepalive request packet received |
| flow_tunnel_ka_req_tx | info | flow | tunnel | Tunnel keepalive request packet transmitted |
| flow_tunnel_ka_reply_tx | info | flow | tunnel | Tunnel keepalive reply packet transmitted |
| flow_tunnel_ctx_alloc | info | flow | tunnel | Tunnel context is allocated |
| flow_tunnel_ctx_free_ssl_close | info | flow | tunnel | Tunnel context is freed upon sslvpn close |
| flow_tunnel_ctx_free_modify | info | flow | tunnel | Tunnel context is freed upon tunnel modify |
| flow_tunnel_nh_not_found | error | flow | tunnel | tunnel next hop key not found |
| flow_tunnel_nh_ipsecin_insert | info | flow | tunnel | Tunnel nexthop inserted, ipsec ingress |
| flow_tunnel_nh_ipseceg_insert | info | flow | tunnel | Tunnel nexthop inserted, ipsec egress |
| flow_tunnel_nh_sslcfg_insert | info | flow | tunnel | Tunnel nexthop inserted, ssl config |
| flow_tunnel_nh_session_insert | info | flow | tunnel | Tunnel nexthop inserted, session |
| flow_tunnel_nh_ipsecin_delete | info | flow | tunnel | Tunnel nexthop deleted, ipsec ingress |
| flow_tunnel_nh_ipseceg_delete | info | flow | tunnel | Tunnel nexthop deleted, ipsec egress |
| flow_tunnel_nh_session_delete | info | flow | tunnel | Tunnel nexthop deleted, session |
| flow_host_slowpath_drop | drop | flow | tunnel | ESP/AH host bound packet comes before tunnel finishes installation |
| flow_inter_cpu_msg_fwd | info | flow | pktproc | Msg forwarded to other CPU |
| flow_gre_tunnel_decap_not_found | drop | flow | tunnel | GRE Tunnel IPs don't match configuration |
| flow_tci_vxlan_setup_unknown | warn | flow | tci | TCI VXLAN cannot confirm VxLAN in slowpath |
| flow_tci_vxlan_without_vni | info | flow | tci | Packet on VxLAN port without I bit |
| flow_tci_vni_alloc_from_udp | info | flow | tci | Create VNI session from UDP session |
| flow_bfd_drop | drop | flow | bfd | BFD packet dropped |
| flow_bfd_rx | info | flow | bfd | BFD packet received |
| flow_bfd_rx_qos_6 | info | flow | bfd | BFD packet received for qos 6 |
| flow_sw_ct | info | flow | pktproc | flow sw cut through |
| flow_predict_session_replaced | info | flow | pktproc | Sess predict install, found existing predict and changed its parent |
| flow_ip_cksm_sw_validation | info | flow | pktproc | Packets for which IP checksum validation was done in software |
| flow_ip_cksm_err_sw | drop | flow | pktproc | Packets for which IP checksum error was found in software |
| flow_tcp_cksm_sw_validation | info | flow | pktproc | Packets for which TCP checksum validation was done in software |
| flow_tcp_cksm_err_sw | drop | flow | pktproc | Packets for which TCP checksum error was found in software |
| flow_fwd_fwd_cnt | info | flow | pktproc | Packets transmitted through fwd_fwd |
| flow_ingress_ifp_lookup_ifmap_fail | drop | flow | parse | Packets dropped: unable to lookup main interface |

list.description: Metrics collection interval. Used in throughput calculation and other derivatives
list.label: Collection Interval (sec)
list.name: collection_interval

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM palo_alto_system_identity WITH KEY=hostname
list.label: Firewall
list.name: hostname

query.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM palo_alto_system_identity WITH KEY=hostname

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM palo_alto_interface_info WITH KEY = "interface" WHERE hostname = '$hostname'
list.label: Interfaces
list.name: hw_interface

query.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM palo_alto_interface_info WITH KEY = "interface" WHERE hostname = '$hostname'

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM palo_alto_interface_counters_logical WITH KEY = "interface" WHERE hostname = '$hostname'
list.label: Interfaces
list.name: logical_interface

query.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM palo_alto_interface_counters_logical WITH KEY = "interface" WHERE hostname = '$hostname'

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM palo_alto_bgp_peer WITH KEY = "peer_name" WHERE hostname = '$hostname'
list.name: bgp_peer

query.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM palo_alto_bgp_peer WITH KEY = "peer_name" WHERE hostname = '$hostname'

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM palo_alto_ipsec_flow WITH KEY = "flow_name" WHERE hostname = '$hostname'
list.name: vpn_flows

query.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM palo_alto_ipsec_flow WITH KEY = "flow_name" WHERE hostname = '$hostname'

list.definition: SELECT inner_interface from (SELECT last("inner_interface") AS "inner_interface" FROM "palo_alto_ipsec_flow" WHERE ("hostname"::tag =~ /^$hostname$/)  GROUP BY "flow_name"::tag)
list.name: ipsec_interface

query.query: SELECT inner_interface from (SELECT last("inner_interface") AS "inner_interface" FROM "palo_alto_ipsec_flow" WHERE ("hostname"::tag =~ /^$hostname$/)  GROUP BY "flow_name"::tag)
